select :select from (select s.id as storeId, s.name as storeName, modifName, fs.name as fundingSource, sum(ss.act_balance_mnei) as residue from inventory.store s join inventory.store_supply ss on ss.store_id = s.id join inventory.batch b on b.id = ss.batch_id join inventory.funding_source fs on fs.id = ss.funding_source_id join (select hm.id as modifId, hm.name as modifName from inventory.hold_modif hm join inventory.form_param_value fpv on fpv.hold_modif_id = hm.id and fpv.value = :hold_dose_value and fpv.unit_id = :hold_dose_measure_id and fpv.form_param_id = 3 left join inventory.form_param_value fpv2 on fpv2.hold_modif_id = hm.id and fpv2.form_param_id = 2 where ((fpv2.value is null and :concentration is null) or (fpv2.value = :concentration and fpv2.unit_id = :concentrationMeasureId)) and hm.holding_id = :holding_id and hm.form_type_id = :hold_form_type_id and hm.mnei_id = :hold_mnei_id and hm.write_off_unit_flag in (1,2)
) as mod on mod.modifId = b.hold_modif_id where :where group by s.id, modifName, fs.id) as t where residue != 0
n2o:sql.n2o:count-query:
select count(1) from (select 1 from (select s.id as storeId, s.name as storeName, modifName, fs.name as fundingSource, sum(ss.act_balance_mnei) as residue from inventory.store s join inventory.store_supply ss on ss.store_id = s.id join inventory.batch b on b.id = ss.batch_id join inventory.funding_source fs on fs.id = ss.funding_source_id join (select hm.id as modifId, hm.name as modifName from inventory.hold_modif hm join inventory.form_param_value fpv on fpv.hold_modif_id = hm.id and fpv.value = :hold_dose_value and fpv.unit_id = :hold_dose_measure_id and fpv.form_param_id = 3 left join inventory.form_param_value fpv2 on fpv2.hold_modif_id = hm.id and fpv2.form_param_id = 2 where ((fpv2.value is null and :concentration is null) or (fpv2.value = :concentration and fpv2.unit_id = :concentrationMeasureId)) and hm.holding_id = :holding_id and hm.form_type_id = :hold_form_type_id and hm.mnei_id = :hold_mnei_id and hm.write_off_unit_flag in (1,2)
) as mod on mod.modifId = b.hold_modif_id where :where group by s.id, modifName, fs.id) as t where residue != 0) as tt
